Gregory Ehlinger is currently persuing my Masters of Science in Advanced Data Analytics at the University of North Texas. He completed his Bachelors of Science in Industrial Distribution from Texas A&M University. For the past 6 years, he has been working as an Operations Associate and Inside Sales for a plumbing wholesaler serving the North Texas Region.  

Competent in handling cost analysis, quality documentation, process improvement & implementation, procurement, upstream &  downstream communication, and direct interaction with customers & vendors. 

Proficient in Tableau, Eclipse, RStudio, Python, Eclipse, and Microsoft Office.
